unit.data.eminence.name: Eminence <size=60%><color=red>Champion</color></size>
unit.data.eminence.lore: The <style="value">Eminence</style> title was given to the most famous Paladin of the Kingdom. The Eminence is a retired saint, very old and a shadow of his younger self. But since the conjunction of the sphere he has been eager to take arms again under the right leadership.
unit.data.eminence.cost.recruit.descript: Base cost Leadership {0} but Reputation impact is doubled
unit.data.eminence.combo.2.rewards.name: Champion's Influence (Eminence)
unit.data.eminence.description.visuals: Very large and heavy humanoid creature in full suit of silver armor lined with gold. A halo of fiery light floating on top of his head. Multiple concentric halos of light behind his back.
